question: A friend has agreed to look after your house and pet while you are on holiday. Write a letter to your friend.In your letter:give contact details for when you are awaygive instructions on how to care for your petdescribe other household dutiesYou should write at least 150 words
text: Hello dear, how are you ,  I am so delighted to write this letter to you because for the first time you are actually coming to my home and I also wanted to thank you for accepting my offer without throwing any tantrums.

Since, as you know  I am going out with my parents to an exotic destination  I really want you to look after my house and my pet too. So here, I will be describing to you my schedules, your duties at my place and so on .

So, we will be out of town from 19th July to 21st July I have already mentioned my emergency contact details below. Also here are some instructions which you really have to take into consideration for my pet.

Firstly , take him to the shower every day then give him a meal  3 times a day and then carry him to the park for a little walk .There are other household chores which you  to have done my friend i.e ,collect the newspaper from the gate then clean the home every day and also give water to the plants so that they could not die.
You have left me speechless, I really don't know how to thank you for this favour but it means a lot to me . Thank you so much.
